mapper.sql: wii.inventory_id, wii.parent_inventory_id, wii.sales_code, wii.make_code, wii.material_owner_id, wii.warehouse_id, wii.storage_id, wii.job_status, wii.material_id, wii.relevance_order_code, wii.inventory_status_id, wii.lock_status, wii.stock_lock, wii.qc_lock, wii.packing_unit_name, wii.packing_qty, wii.inventory_total_qty, wii.package_specification_quantity, wii.pallet_code, wii.receiving_date, wii.qc_date, wii.production_date, wii.expired_date, wii.batch_code, wii.po_code, wii.work_order_code, wii.sales_order_code, wii.supplier_id, wii.`status`, wii.remark, wii.org_id, wii.create_user_id, wii.create_time, wii.modified_user_id, wii.modified_time, wii.is_delete
mapper.select:
select ,bmo.material_owner_name,bw.warehouse_name,bs.storage_name,bm.material_code,bm.material_name,bss.supplier_name,bo.organization_name,su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name ,bis.inventory_status_name from wms_inner_inventory wii LEFT JOIN base_material_owner bmo ON wii.material_owner_id = bmo.material_owner_id LEFT JOIN base_warehouse bw ON wii.warehouse_id = bw.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN base_storage bs ON wii.storage_id = bs.storage_id LEFT JOIN base_material bm ON wii.material_id = bm.material_id LEFT JOIN base_supplier bss ON wii.supplier_id = bss.supplier_id LEFT JOIN ocean_v2.sys_user su ON wii.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean_v2.sys_user sus ON wii.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN base_organization bo ON wii.org_id = bo.organization_id LEFT JOIN base_inventory_status bis ON bis.inventory_status_id = wii.inventory_status_id
and wii.packing_qty > 0
and wii.sales_code like CONCAT("%",#{salesCode},"%")
and wii.make_code like CONCAT("%",#{makeCode},"%")
and wii.material_owner_name like CONCAT("%",#{materialOwnerName},"%")
and wii.warehouse_name like CONCAT("%",#{warehouseName},"%")
and wii.storage_name like CONCAT("%",#{storageName},"%")
and wii.material_id = #{materialId}
and wii.material_code like CONCAT("%",#{materialCode},"%")
and wii.material_name like CONCAT("%",#{materialName},"%")
and wii.relevance_order_code like CONCAT("%",#{relevanceOrderCode},"%")
and wii.pallet_code like CONCAT("%",#{palletCode},"%")
and wii.receiving_date like CONCAT("%",#{receivingDate},"%")
and wii.batch_code like CONCAT("%",#{batchCode},"%")
and wii.po_code like CONCAT("%",#{poCode},"%")
and wii.work_order_code like CONCAT("%",#{workOrderCode},"%")
and wii.sales_order_code like CONCAT("%",#{salesOrderCode},"%")
and wii.supplier_name like CONCAT("%",#{supplierName},"%")
and wii.status=#{status}
and date_format(wii.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and wii.warehouse_id = #{warehouseId}
and wii.org_id = #{orgId}
and wii.inventory_status_id = #{inventoryStatusId}
order by wii.create_time desc
